messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: TURN YOUR MUTHERTRUCKIN SUIT SENSORS ON AND IF YOU DONT KNOW HOW SAY ON COMMS JEEEEZ

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: You have two minutes to get in the HoPline if you want more access

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Space Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Lol i dunno why the hop wants to leave so bad

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Centcomm sent us 3 notices that we cant leave

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We'll catch the next shuttle

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: See centcomm recalled it

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Next head taht calls shuttle goes out airlock

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Space Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Buying cooler shuttle ai keeps shutting my power

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We actually have power and most people are still alive the HOP is spreading fake news

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hop is not spreading fake news,there have been countless murders and captain is being a total idiot

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The HoP has gone psychotic and has continued to spread fake news

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The HoP hurted me I have boo boo

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I ordered a dominoes pizza shoul come on the cargo tram

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: A centcomm official has arrived to put a stop to the fake news and find the rogue HoP

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chapel.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We're gonn revive the HoP and warden and put them through a grueling re-education training camp

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We need a cook an a janitor anyone willing to do those jobs go to the HoP line

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Sar-Sie Tedrow. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
